member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.dictionaryTime
member.summary: This System.String represents the Dictionary Creation execution time.

member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.puzzleTime
member.summary: This System.String represents the Puzzle Creation execution time.

member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.solutionTime
member.summary: This System.String represents the Puzzle Solution execution time.

member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.solution
member.summary: Object responsible for providing the puzzle solution.

member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.puzzleCreator
member.summary: Object responsible for providing the puzzle creation.

member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.dictionaryCreator
member.summary: Object responsible for providing the dictionary creation.

member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.timer1
member.summary: Timer used to get the time of the System clock before an algorithm execution.

member.name: F:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.timer2
member.summary: Timer used to get the time of the System clock after an algorithm execution.

member.name: M:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.GetDictionaryTime(System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable@,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: This operation will execute the CreateDictionary() operation and return the time taken to make it as a System.String
member.param: The HtmlTable to which will be printed the results.
Specifies which dictionary to pass to DictionaryCreator().
Specifies how large the dictionary should be when passed to DictionaryCreator() as its second arguement.
The string array collection keeping track of the resultant statistics
Specifies the minimum size of a word to use.

member.name: M:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.GetPuzzleTime(System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable@,System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: This operation will execute the GeneratePuzzle() operaton and return the time taken to make it as a System.String
member.param: The HtmlTable to which will be printed the results.
The string array collection keeping track of the resultant statistics

member.name: M:ns_ManageStats.ManageStats.GetSolutionTime(System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTable@,System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: This operation will execute the Solve() operation and return the time taken to solve the puzzle as a System.String
member.param: The HtmlTable to which will be printed the results.
The string array collection keeping track of the resultant statistics
member.returns: The total number of words found in the puzzle that matched the dictionary.
